translation.en: ♪ You get me closer to God ♪
translation.zh:
‎（威灵汉姆学院
‎本校配有祷告牌“空调”！）

translation.en: Uh, wait, wait, wait, Sterling, um...
My virginity is a gift that I want to give to my future wife,
translation.zh:
‎我想把自己的童贞作为礼物
‎送给我未来的妻子

translation.en: and I'm pretty sure you want to give the same gift to your future husband,
translation.zh: ‎你肯定也希望送同样的礼物 ‎给你未来的丈夫

translation.en: so even though I'm feeling very, um...
Even though I'm feeling very tempted, um...
translation.zh: ‎即便我现在觉得自己很是按捺不住…

translation.en: and we strive to be good and gracious

translation.zh:
‎《约翰福音》第3章第16节
‎“神爱世人

translation.en: that He gave His one and only son
translation.zh: ‎甚至将他的独生子赐给他们

translation.en: that whoever believes in Him, shall not perish
translation.zh: ‎叫一切信他的 不至灭亡

translation.en: Whoever believes in Him will have eternal life.
You believe in Jesus, don't you?
Well, then you shall have eternal life.
I shall not be in want."
Oh, man. I really love you. [chuckles]
"And above all, love each other... deeply
Yeah, that was-- that was super dope.
translation.zh: ‎对 刚才真是…真是太棒了

translation.en: Yeah, that twisty thing, where I added the second hand?
translation.zh:
‎嗯 那个弯着揉的动作
‎我把另一只手也用上的时候？

‎你享受到了我提供的
‎全球首次体验的待遇

translation.en: [chuckles] I was just meaning, like, at the end where I...
Did it feel better than when you do it with your own hand?
translation.zh: ‎这样比你自己用手舒服多了吧？

translation.en: but it's still, like, a lot cooler
because you got tits... -[chuckles] -...and stuff like that, you know?
translation.zh: ‎因为能看到咪咪啊什么的 你懂吧？
‎谢谢 你这话太安慰人了

translation.en: -[boy] No, you will... -[girl] You want to try and win?
translation.zh: ‎不 你会… ‎你想试试看能赢吗？

translation.en: -I don't think you need to cheat-- -[boy] Okay. Let's see.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得你不用作弊…
‎-好的 再说吧

translation.en: -[boy] Give me that thumb. Give it to me. -[girl] Take it.
translation.zh:
‎-把大拇指给我 快给我
‎-给你

translation.en: -All right. I'm out of here. -Bye, dude.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 我走了
‎-再见 伙计

‎-再见 卢克
‎-再见 伙计

translation.en: I know this goes without saying,
translation.zh: ‎我知道这话不必说你也知道

translation.en: -but let's keep this private. -[car door shuts]
Sterling, are you sure we feel okay about this?
translation.zh: ‎斯特琳 你觉得这样可以吗？
‎我们刚违背上帝 犯下了罪孽

translation.en: But we love each other, and love covers over a multitude of sins.
translation.zh: ‎但我们彼此相爱 ‎而且爱能遮掩许多的罪

translation.en: And I really, really love you...
I know, shocker. The slutty twin actually having feelings for somebody,
translation.zh:
‎我知道这让人震惊
‎双胞胎里放荡的那个居然动了真心

translation.en: but hear me out. Three weeks with one guy
translation.zh:
‎但听我说完
‎跟同一个男生在一起三周

translation.en: -is definitely a record for me. -[pop music playing]
maybe this is the year I-- I-- I do it.
translation.zh: ‎或许我今年就该把那件事办了

translation.en: I stop being the "everything but" slut and seal the deal.
translation.zh:
‎我不再当那个“一切都行
‎只有一事例外”的贱人 彻底搞定那事

translation.en: and it's probably going to hurt the first time,
but with patience and a shit ton of coconut oil...
translation.zh: ‎但如果耐心一点 多抹点椰子油…

translation.en: Nature's lube, you need to know that.
translation.zh: ‎那是天然润滑剂 这个你得知道

translation.en: I think I'm finally ready to bone, Sterl.
translation.zh:
‎我想我终于做好
‎滚床单的准备了 斯特尔
‎行了 老天 童贞女玛利亚

translation.en: Actually, technically, you can't call me that anymore,
translation.zh:
‎其实 严格来说
‎你不能再叫我“童贞女”了

translation.en: seeing as... Luke and I just had sex.
translation.zh: ‎因为…我和卢克刚刚做过爱了

translation.en: Luke and I... just had intercourse.
Like, "sex" that I talk about all the time?
translation.zh: ‎就是我经常挂在嘴边的“做爱”？

translation.en: I guess you're the sluttier twin now.
translation.zh: ‎如今你是双胞胎里更放荡的那个了
‎伙计 那家伙看起来没事

translation.en: Obviously, we call the police and then Mom and Dad--
translation.zh: ‎显然 我们应该报警 然后打给爸妈…

translation.en: Are you forgetting that Dad doesn't know we took his precious hunting truck?
translation.zh:
‎你忘了爸爸根本不知道
‎我们偷开了他的宝贝打猎卡车吗？

translation.en: You know what? I'm going to give that dude a piece of my mind.
translation.zh: ‎这样吧 我去给那家伙讲讲道理

translation.en: I've been chased for the last 20 miles by some dumb skirt.
translation.zh: ‎我被一个蠢娘们儿追了32公里

translation.en: Can't believe I even broke a sweat.
All right, no need to get carried away, girls.
translation.zh: ‎行了 姑娘们 别冲动

translation.en: Look, I wasn't even trying to skip bail, all right?
translation.zh: ‎听着 我根本不是在弃保潜逃 好吗？

translation.en: I got some personal shit to take care of.
Okay, buck teeth. Put your hands on the car.
translation.zh: ‎好了 大龅牙 把你的手放在车上

translation.en: I've been tracking this broke-dick dog...
And y'all gonna swoop in and snag my bounty, huh?
translation.zh:
‎现在你俩想横插一脚
‎抢走我的赏金？

translation.en: I'll kick you 20 percent of the 5K.
translation.zh: ‎5000块的赏金 我分你们两成

translation.en: -They think we're bounty hunters. -I caught on to that.
translation.zh:
‎-他们以为我们是赏金猎人
‎-对 我听明白了

translation.en: -And dude's gonna give us 1000 dollars. -Fast math!
translation.zh:
‎-那家伙要给我们1000美元
‎-你算得真快！

translation.en: Sale math. Look, Sterling, I know you think this is sketchy or whatever,
translation.zh: ‎打折时常算 听着 斯特琳 ‎我知道你会觉得这样不地道

translation.en: but we need that money to fix Dad's truck.
translation.zh: ‎但我们需要那笔钱修好爸爸的卡车

‎一半 我们该得一半 ‎-等等 什么？
‎-我们做了一半的工作

translation.en: Did half the work, should get half the money.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 什么？
‎-我们做了一半的工作 ‎就该得一半的赏金

translation.en: -Oh. Um... Yeah, okay. -Wait, are you wussing out?
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 好吧
‎-等一下 你要退缩吗？

translation.en: After this, can we get Chick-fil-A? I am so hungry.
translation.zh:
‎完事后能去副乐鸡吃点东西吗？
‎因为我好饿

translation.en: That your daddy's shotgun you got there?

translation.zh: ‎这是一把莫斯伯格500泵动式霰弹枪

translation.en: I used to be a Remington 870 kind of girl,
translation.zh: ‎我之前喜欢用雷明登870式霰弹枪

translation.en: I like the shell lifter placement of the Mossberg better.
translation.zh: ‎但我更喜欢莫斯伯格的弹药架

translation.en: Now, what I really prefer is this Glock 19.
translation.zh: ‎但其实我真正喜欢的是这支格洛克19

translation.en: But yes, mister, I got it from Daddy!
translation.zh: ‎但是 没错 先生 是我爸给我的！

translation.en: Y'all a piece of work, I give you that.
translation.zh: ‎不得不说 你俩还真是不一般

translation.en: But I don't give big cuts to folks
translation.zh: ‎但我不会分给其他人大额赏金

translation.en: unless they've been bringin' the heat from the beginning, okay?
translation.zh:
‎除非他们从一开始就出了大力
‎知道吗？

translation.en: And this one here, I've been tracking him for a while.
translation.zh: ‎这家伙我已经追了好几个月了

translation.en: He's slicker than a can of oil.
Got more tricks in his bag than Felix the... Cat!
translation.zh: ‎肚子里的坏水比菲力猫…还多！

translation.en: Damn it, don't you run from me.
Goddamn it, I've been running my mouth like I'm on a talk show.
-What are we doing? -Hell if I know.
Are we, like, getting this dude?

translation.zh:
‎-所以是的 对吧？
‎-对！当然是！

translation.en: Salads. I've got to eat more salads.
translation.zh: ‎沙拉 我以后得多吃沙拉了

translation.en: [Sterling] I hope there's no ticks in this grass.
Oh, my gosh, Blair, that was crazy.
translation.zh: ‎老天 布莱尔 刚才真是太疯狂了

‎-嘿 你把我的车门修好了
‎-出来！

translation.en: we're just gonna go ahead and--
since we--we got the... the perp.
translation.zh: ‎既然是我们…我们抓住了…行凶者

translation.en: So, you two have fun wrangling this 280 pound sack of shit...
translation.zh:
‎所以还是你们俩好好跟
‎这个127公斤重的人渣斗嘴…

‎-是108公斤
‎-你给我闭嘴 克雷登

translation.en: ...and delivering him to jail in your janked up truck.
translation.zh:
‎…然后把用你们那辆撞坏了的卡车
‎把他送去监狱吧

translation.en: Wait. We're actually... we're good with-- we're good with half.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 我们其实…分我们一半就好

‎-我是布莱尔 她是斯特琳
‎-我是斯特琳 她是布莱尔

translation.en: Y'all track skips around here a lot?
translation.zh: ‎你们经常追踪弃保潜逃的人吗？

translation.en: [clears throat] Yeah. Yeah, here and there. Yeah, sometimes--
translation.zh: ‎对 没错 我们到处跑 对 有时候…

translation.en: sometimes here and other times, there.
translation.zh: ‎有时候在这里 有时候去别的地方

translation.en: but I've been bounty huntin' just shy of ten year.
translation.zh: ‎但我已经当赏金猎人差不多10年了

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we're bounty hunters, too.
And also, she got laid today.
translation.zh: ‎而且 她今天跟人做爱了
‎我指的是阴茎反复性地完全插入

translation.en: But yeah, she did and I'm really proud of her.
translation.zh:
‎但 没错 她做了
‎我很为她感到骄傲

translation.en: This summer, I was so blessed
use his helicopter to hop up to our lake house
translation.zh:
‎使用他的直升机
‎飞去了我们家的湖畔别墅

translation.en: We had such a productive time
in quiet worship and, of course, doing acts of service.
translation.zh:
‎度过了卓有成效的周末
‎当然我们还进行了各种服侍活动

translation.en: We knitted sweaters for the sick, dirty babies with tiny heads in Brazil.
translation.zh:
‎我们为巴西那些生了病
‎营养不良的贫民儿童织了毛衣

translation.en: Sweaters filled with Christ's infinite love.
translation.zh: ‎那些毛衣里饱含着耶稣无尽的爱

‎（谢谢你 阿布丽尔） ‎“阿布丽尔”在巴西语里
‎是“阿普丽尔”的意思
‎阿布丽尔 哇哦 好的…

translation.en: My spirit is so heavy for those pequito niños.
translation.zh: ‎那些小“海”让我的心情无比沉重

translation.en: That's a great slide show, April.
translation.zh: ‎阿普丽尔 你的PPT做得很好

translation.en: Okay, but we do need to move on.
translation.zh: ‎好了 但我们真得继续了

translation.en: Listen, everybody, we had some excellent submissions
translation.zh: ‎大家听好了 ‎关于今年的团契学生领袖

translation.en: for this year's Fellowship student leader.
translation.zh: ‎我们收到了很多优秀的申请

translation.en: if you all want to see more pictures
of me being a Christian leader,
translation.zh: ‎关于我身为基督领袖的照片

translation.en: hashtag "April helps sick kids through Christ."
translation.zh:
‎标签为“阿普丽尔通过基督
‎帮助生病儿童”

translation.en: Yes. Oh, yes, we will do that.
translation.zh: ‎对 噢 当然 我们会去看的

translation.en: Okay, but like I was saying, guys,
translation.zh: ‎好的 但我刚才想说 各位

translation.en: we had a lot of great candidates,
but this year, I choose the individual
who earnestly represents Jesus' path on this Earth, right?
translation.zh:
‎能完全代表
‎耶稣在地球上的道路的人 对吧？
‎我是说 这位年轻的女子

translation.en: makes Christ proud every single day.
So when you guys are struggling, right?
translation.zh: ‎所以在你们挣扎的时候 对吧？

translation.en: And you're struggling on your path with the Lord,
translation.zh: ‎你们在主的道路上挣扎的时候

translation.en: I want you to look to her for guidance, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我希望你们向她寻求引导 好吗？

translation.en: This year's Fellowship student leader is...
I'm really looking forward to this responsibility
of helping guide you guys on your faith journeys.
translation.zh: ‎在你们的信仰之路上帮忙指引大家

translation.en: Uh, lately, I've been feeling God's presence in my life
translation.zh:
‎最近 我比以往任何时候
‎都强烈地感觉到

translation.en: and yeah, I just feel Christ inside me.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我就是感觉基督在我体内

translation.en: like, um, like not like "inside" inside me,
like, just... um, if... you know what I mean, right?
translation.zh: ‎就是…如果…你们懂我的意思 对吧？

translation.en: [woman] It was a great meeting, everybody.
translation.zh: ‎各位 今天的见面会很棒

translation.en: Congratulations, I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜你 亲爱的 我真为你骄傲

‎-好 午餐时见 好的 再见
‎-好 好的

translation.en: Oh, I'm so looking forward to working with you this year.
We are going to have so much fun!
translation.zh: ‎我们一定会度过愉快的时光！

translation.en: And I just know you'll bring something extra special to this position, huh?
translation.zh: ‎我就是知道你会 ‎给这个职位带来额外的精彩
‎谢谢 艾伦 这是我的荣幸

translation.en: Okay. Well, we got the lock-in coming up.
translation.zh: ‎好了 马上就是封闭集会了

translation.en: So, I'll need your full attention on that.
translation.zh: ‎所以我希望你把精力都放在这上面

translation.en: And then why don't we just plan to meet sometime soon
translation.zh: ‎不如我们约个时间很快再见一面

translation.en: and discuss next week's devotional reading.
to start the year off with abstinence.
Abstinence as a devotional topic, is that right?
translation.zh: ‎把禁欲作为灵修的主题 对吧？

translation.en: [laughs] You know, Jesus was a rebel too.
Yeah. I heard that he saw Nine Inch Nails 20 times on the Downward Spiral tour.
translation.zh:
‎对 我听说他在自我毁灭之旅
‎看了九寸钉乐队20次演出

translation.en: You have a great imagination, Blair.
translation.zh: ‎布莱尔 你想象力真丰富

translation.en: Text me if you need me.
translation.zh: ‎如果需要帮助 给我发短信

translation.en: What, why? It's, like, your whole thing.
translation.zh: ‎什么 为什么？这一直是你的目标

translation.en: I can't lead a Christian Community if I've... you know?
translation.zh:
‎我不能领导一个基督社团
‎如果我已经…你懂吧？

translation.en: Had sex with your long-term boyfriend?
translation.zh: ‎跟你的长期男友发生了关系？

translation.en: But what I mean is, do you think you did anything wrong?
translation.zh: ‎但我想说 你觉得自己做了错事吗？

translation.en: Not any more wrong than it was wrong
that I lied about farting in the car this morning.
translation.zh:
‎说那个屁不是我放的
‎也不算什么错事

translation.en: A sin's a sin. You know?
If you repent, then you're forgiven in the eyes of the Lord, so...
translation.zh:
‎如果你忏悔 那在主的眼里
‎你就被原谅了 所以…

translation.en: If Ellen knew I was sexually active,
translation.zh: ‎如果艾伦知道我作风不检点
‎不仅会剥夺我学生领袖的头衔

translation.en: she'd kick me out of Fellowship altogether.
So, you're either an honest slut or a lying slut?
translation.zh:
‎所以你要么是诚实的荡妇
‎要么是撒谎的荡妇？

translation.en: you have something impressive to put on your college apps.
translation.zh:
‎你在申请大学的简历上
‎会有精彩的一笔
‎斯特琳 恭喜你成为团契学生领袖

translation.en: I really thought it was going to be me,
because I'm going to be so busy this year
with other extracurriculars like Young Republicans, Forensics,
translation.zh:
‎其他课外组织
‎比如说年轻的共和党人、辩论协会

translation.en: I think the straights are already aligned.
That's really good for you, April.
Yeah, you think I wouldn't help a fellow...
translation.zh: ‎嗯 你觉得我不会帮助一个同胞…

translation.en: [Jennings] All right, well... -I gotta go to Gym. -[Blair moans]
translation.zh: ‎好了 那个…我得去上体育课了

translation.en: I will see you later. All right, dude?
translation.zh: ‎我们随后再见 好吗 伙计？

translation.en: Wait, Jennings. I have Gym, too.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 詹宁斯 我也得去上体育课

translation.en: She just took the condom wrapper.
translation.zh: ‎她刚把避孕套的包装拿走了

translation.en: Did you hang out with Sterling and Luke at all?
translation.zh: ‎你有跟斯特琳和卢克一起玩吗？

translation.en: Uh, why are you talking to me? [chuckles]
She's gonna tell the whole fricking school.
translation.zh: ‎她肯定会让全校的人都知道

translation.en: People's faith in gossip is stronger than their faith in the Almighty.
translation.zh: ‎比起万能的主 人们更相信流言
‎克洛伊 宝贝 你怎么样？

translation.en: Brownies, fresh out of the oven.
[woman] Blair, I would stick to just one.
translation.zh: ‎布莱尔 要是我就只吃一块

translation.en: You know, sugar makes you break out
You want to look your best.
Good looks are vital to a successful career in sports.
translation.zh:
‎漂亮的长相
‎对取得体育生涯的成功至关重要

translation.en: Michael Phelps is kind of cute.
I was Fellowship leader back in high school.
translation.zh: ‎我当年上高中时也是团契领袖

translation.en: Did I mention that I killed it today in lax practice, like a total badass?
translation.zh:
‎我有说在今天的长曲棍球比赛中
‎碾压全场 就像惹不起的恶妇那样？

‎-注意措辞 那么说不好
‎-但…

translation.en: That is fantastic, Blair. What'd you do?
translation.zh: ‎真是太棒了 布莱尔 你做了什么？

translation.en: Did you give those attackers the old "Wesley check"?
translation.zh:
‎你对那些进攻者
‎使了经典的“韦斯利阻挡”？

translation.en: I'm so proud of my girls.
Okay, just texted Bowser that we're on our way.
translation.zh:
‎好的 我刚给鲍泽发了短信
‎说我们就在路上

translation.en: Honestly, Blair, is there not another way we could get the money?
translation.zh:
‎说实话 布莱尔
‎就没有其他弄钱的法子了吗？

translation.en: Is prostitution legal in the state of Georgia
translation.zh: ‎如果妓女热衷于卖淫 那卖淫能在

translation.en: if the prostitute is super into it?
Okay, we're going to pick up the 2,500,
get Dad's truck fixed before the weekend,
translation.zh: ‎在周末之前把爸爸的卡车修好

translation.en: and then never think about this again.
But, what if 2,500 doesn't cover it?
Can't you buy a whole new car for that?
What kind of bounty hunters drive a hybrid?
translation.zh: ‎什么样的赏金猎人会开油电混合车？

translation.en: Um, the kind that doesn't want Atlanta
to be waterfront property by the year 2030.
translation.zh: ‎亚特兰大成为海滨地带的猎人

translation.en: Oh, come on, let's just take the truck.
translation.zh: ‎行了 我们就开卡车去吧

translation.en: I'd rather Dad notice that it's gone than notice it's--
translation.zh:
‎我宁愿爸爸发现这车不见了
‎也不希望他发现这车…

translation.en: Come on, you dirty old hippie. Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎行了 你这色色的老嬉皮士 我们走！

translation.en: You know, you're technically three minutes older than me.
translation.zh: ‎严格来说 你只比我早出生三分钟

translation.en: Hey, Cath, could you get the bathroom for me, too, please?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 凯瑟
‎你能帮我打扫一下卫生间吗？

translation.en: Okay, we're not on a ship.
Just let her be happy, Bowser.
Is this your "job" job? I thought you were a bounty-hunter.
translation.zh: ‎这是你的正式工作吗？ ‎我还以为你是赏金猎人

translation.en: Can I have a vanilla with extra gummy bears?
translation.zh:
‎能给我份香草酸奶
‎多加小熊软糖吗？

translation.en: Wait. You. Don't knock my side-hustle, kid.
translation.zh: ‎等等 你 不许抨击我的副业 孩子
‎相信我 你不知道后果多严重

translation.en: And yes, you can have extra gummy bears,
translation.zh: ‎对 你可以多加小熊软糖

translation.en: Do you sing if I tip?
translation.zh: ‎如果给小费 你会唱歌吗？

translation.en: Don't give it to that bitch-ass, Terrance.
You heard what I said, didn't you?
Hey. Put that back. What are you doing? Here you go.
translation.zh: ‎把那个放回去 你在做什么？给你

translation.en: -That's great. Thank you. It's good. -All right.
translation.zh:
‎-好极了 谢谢你 很好
‎-嗯 好的
‎很高兴跟你们合作 姑娘们

translation.en: Anyway, do you know how much it might cost us
translation.zh: ‎总之 你知道我们得花多少钱

translation.en: Well, as a man who's crashed many cars,
translation.zh: ‎作为一个撞坏过无数辆车的男人

translation.en: I'd say you'd probably run yourself about 5K worth of damage here.
translation.zh:
‎撞成这样
‎你们或许得花5000美元才能修好

translation.en: Um... Do you have any more jobs?
Ah, jeez, if I had any more jobs,
translation.zh: ‎老天 我要是有别的工作…

translation.en: if I had more jobs-- Look...
I like you girls. I do.
You run like a deer. It was amazing.
translation.zh: ‎跑起来像小鹿一样快 快得惊人

translation.en: And you, you're a freakishly good shot.
But I've got rent to pay.
I can't split my rewards on folks I can nab on my own, see?
translation.zh:
‎我不能跟别人分享
‎我靠自己就能搞定的奖金 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, getting it is half the battle, ah?
translation.zh: ‎嗯 能理解算是很重要的了

translation.en: So, what do you want to do now?
That secret club of which we know the exact location?
translation.zh:
‎那个我们恰好知道位置的
‎秘密俱乐部？

translation.en: Hey, uh, what's the address over there?
The address alone won't get you very far.
-And why is that? -You need us to get in it.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-你得靠我们才能进去

translation.en: It-- um-- It's in this country club
and they only cater to this specific clientele, it's--
translation.zh: ‎他们只招待某些客人 也就是…

translation.en: I don't think it's written in stone, but...

translation.zh: ‎其实 或许…真的刻在石头上呢

translation.en: So, unfortunately these places have some outdated policies that don't--
translation.zh:
‎所以 不幸的是
‎这些地方奉行一些过时的政策

translation.en: Okay. Enough with the Black history, Reverend Al Sharpton. I get it.
translation.zh:
‎-并不反映…
‎-好了 ‎别再说什么黑人历史了
‎阿尔夏普顿牧师 我明白

translation.en: Yeah, so you can have the address for,
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们可以告诉你地址

translation.en: I don't know, say... a hundred,
or you could have personal whitey escorts
translation.zh: ‎或者你可以有私人白人陪同

translation.en: If you deliver me John Stevens,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们帮我抓到约翰史蒂文斯

translation.en: It can't be April's dad. There's gotta be a bajillion John Stevenses.
translation.zh: ‎没可能是阿普丽尔她爸 ‎那得是无数个约翰史蒂文斯加一起

translation.en: Bajillion John Stevenses that belong to Men's Parlor?
translation.zh:
‎男子休息室里
‎有无数个约翰史蒂文斯？

translation.en: April's dad is the creep on our eighth grade trip to Jekyll Island
translation.zh:
‎还有 我们八年级去哲基尔岛旅行时
‎阿普丽尔的爸爸

translation.en: that said I was developing nicely.
translation.zh: ‎就是说我“发育”得很好的那个怪人

translation.en: I'd love to arrest him and watch April squirm.
translation.zh:
‎我要逮捕他
‎然后看着阿普丽尔无地自容

translation.en: Are you wearing my Savage X Fenty bralette again?
translation.zh:
‎你是不是又穿了
‎我那件热辣朝天芬蒂文胸？

translation.en: I hate you. You'll stink it up with your smelly boobs.
translation.zh:
‎我讨厌你 你咪咪有味道
‎会把它弄臭的
‎没问题 我们知道约翰史蒂文斯

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we brought him in before.
translation.zh: ‎对 我们之前就把他抓了进去

translation.en: What did the old boy do this time?
Having a meeting tonight at The Men's Parlor at 6:00.
translation.zh: ‎他今晚6点要在男子休息室跟人见面

translation.en: My bail bondsman. My bail bondswoman...
translation.zh: ‎我的保释代理人 我的女保释代理人…

translation.en: My bail bondsperson got a tip.
translation.zh: ‎我的保释代理经纪人收到了线报

‎-好极了 我们颠儿吧
‎-嘿！坐我的车

translation.en: Well, this is some Django shit.

translation.zh: ‎嘿 特雷弗 嘿 迈尔斯

translation.en: Oh, uh, you guys going to be parking today?
No. He's just dropping us off.
Park down by the service entrance,
We'll be back with your guy.
What the hell is a "fruit ninja"?
I'm really hoping you have a plan.
Not so much a plan as like a general idea...ish...ment.
translation.zh:
‎不算什么计划
‎就是一个不成熟的想…法…吧

translation.en: we walk into The Men's Parlor like a couple of Lara Crofts.
translation.zh:
‎我们像劳拉克劳馥那样
‎走进男子休息室

translation.en: And then we slip some of my melatonin into Mr. Stevens' drink,
translation.zh:
‎然后我偷偷把自己的褪黑素片
‎放进史蒂文斯先生的饮料里

translation.en: like James Bond and then we grab him--
translation.zh:
‎就像詹姆斯邦德一样
‎然后我们抓住他…

translation.en: Or we can clock him in the head with this pistol?
translation.zh: ‎或者我们可以用手枪把他敲晕？

translation.en: Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Jenson. Y'all are looking sharp.
translation.zh:
‎你们好 詹森先生和夫人
‎你们看起来真靓

translation.en: I love that nail color, Mrs. Jenson.
translation.zh: ‎詹森夫人 我喜欢你指甲的颜色

translation.en: It's like skin color, but prettier.
translation.zh: ‎虽然跟肤色很接近 但更漂亮

translation.en: Tell your mother and daddy we said hello.
Yes, ma'am, and see you Sunday morning bright and early.
translation.zh: ‎好的 夫人 那我们周日一大早见了

translation.en: Aren't they precious? I wish Frank would date one of them.
translation.zh:
‎多好的两个姑娘
‎我真希望弗兰克能跟其中一个约会

translation.en: I wasn't going to meet up with a bounty hunter unarmed.
translation.zh:
‎我才不要不带武器
‎就去见一个赏金猎人

translation.en: [scoffs] He's not here. It's past six o'clock--
Hey. What are you two doing in here?
But, I don't see a Women's Parlour here.
translation.zh: ‎但我没在这里见到女子休息室

translation.en: So, we're here in protest. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎所以我们是来这里抗议的 好吗？

translation.en: ♪ Show me what a Women's Parlour looks like ♪
translation.zh: ‎让我知道女子休息室是什么样子

translation.en: ♪ This is what a Women's Parlour looks like! ♪
Uh-- Uh-- We're looking for John Stevens.
We heard he had a meeting. Know where we can find him?
translation.zh:
‎我听说他在这里有个会
‎你知道我们能在哪找到他吗？

translation.en: If I told you, I would lose my job.
translation.zh: ‎我要是说了 就会丢掉饭碗

translation.en: You know how weird this place is about secrets and traditions.
translation.zh:
‎你们知道这地方对秘密和传统
‎有多奇怪的规矩

translation.en: All right, he's in the humidor.
It's where a group of guys called The Bourbon Club meet.
translation.zh:
‎那是一群自称波旁俱乐部的
‎男子的聚会地

translation.en: -It's around that corner, but-- -Okay. Thanks, Miles.
translation.zh:
‎-就在那边 但…
‎-好的 谢谢你 迈尔斯

translation.en: Did you see that? I, like, totally seduced him.
translation.zh: ‎你刚看到了吗？他完全被我勾引了

translation.en: What are y'all in the mood for?
We got top shelf or... hell, we can all slum it with Beam.
translation.zh:
‎这里有顶级好酒 或者…
‎算了 就凑活喝占边威士忌吧

translation.en: [man] Find that single barrel we like so much from Pigeon Forge. Mm.
translation.zh:
‎找到我们在鸽子谷
‎特别喜欢的那款单桶威士忌

translation.en: Anyway, now y'all gonna have to believe me when I tell y'all...
translation.zh:
‎总之 你们都得信我
‎如果我告诉你们…

translation.en: -that was Gerald. -[man] And now you're tellin' fibs.
translation.zh:
‎-那是杰拉德干的
‎-你说什么胡话

translation.en: [man 3] No, he's not. Girl was there, and the cops were coming
translation.zh:
‎-不 他没胡说
‎-那姑娘也在场 警察马上就到

translation.en: and John happened to be at the motel bar.
[chuckles] Gerald asked him to take the fall.
Saying you're the one who beat up a whore is a damn big sacrifice.
translation.zh:
‎你说自己打了一个妓女
‎这可是很大的牺牲啊

translation.en: He's been my business partner for 18 years.
translation.zh: ‎18年来他一直是我的商业合作伙伴

translation.en: Ovarian cancer's got her any day now.
I couldn't let Gerald ruin himself in her eyes,
translation.zh:
‎我不忍心让杰拉德
‎毁掉在她眼里的形象

translation.en: so when she passes, he'll confess.
translation.zh: ‎所以等她过世后 他就去自首

translation.en: And until then, I'm hidin' out.
translation.zh: ‎在那之前 我躲起来就好

translation.en: [man 1] Dadgum, you're a good man, John.
translation.zh: ‎老天 你真是个好人 约翰

translation.en: [man 2] A lot better than I'd have done, that's for damn sure.
translation.zh:
‎可以肯定的是
‎你的行为比我的高尚多了

translation.en: [man 2] Hey, I found it. There it is.
Mr. Stevens was just protecting his fuckboy partner.
translation.zh:
‎史蒂文斯先生只是
‎在保护他那个怂包生意伙伴

translation.en: He didn't do it, it would be wrong. You know this!
translation.zh: ‎可他没犯罪 那么做不对 你知道的！

translation.en: You can be very un-fun sometimes!
Get out of here! Oh, peach! [chuckles]
Goddamn it, I thought you said you knew what you were doin'.
translation.zh: ‎可恶 你们不是说做这个很在行嘛

translation.en: We thought that you said that you knew what you were doing.
translation.zh:
‎我们还以为你说过
‎你做这个很在行呢

translation.en: Yeah, Bowser, so you must of... had some misinformation.
translation.zh:
‎对 鲍泽 所以你肯定…
‎是收到了错误信息

translation.en: It was really good. Did you have a good day?
I had such a good day.
-Okay. -See ya. Uh, I go-- I got golf.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-再见 我还有高尔夫球课

translation.en: You mean you boned, but slower?
translation.zh: ‎你是说你们慢慢地滚床单了？

translation.en: That must have been so intense.

translation.zh:
‎-嗨 阿普丽尔
‎-嗨 布莱尔

translation.en: If I didn't know my fate at this school
translation.zh: ‎我要是不知道我在这学校的命运

translation.en: rested in her cold little condom-wrapper-grabbing hands,
translation.zh:
‎就掌握在她那只
‎爱拿避孕套包装的冰冷小手里

translation.en: I'd feel bad for April about her dad.
translation.zh: ‎我会因为她爸爸的遭遇同情她

translation.en: I hate her dumb bitch face but... yeah.
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌她那种愚蠢的贱脸 但…没错

translation.en: If his business partner doesn't confess, does he have to go to jail for him?
translation.zh:
‎如果他的生意伙伴不去自首
‎那他得替他坐牢吗？

translation.en: She'd have one more thing to pray about, that's for sure.
translation.zh:
‎可以肯定的是
‎她又多了一件可以祷告的事

translation.en: You don't have to sign who it's from.
translation.zh:
‎短信是不用署名的 ‎（妈妈 短信不用署名
‎我们知道是你发的）

translation.en: Disappointment is beyond what your father and I feel right now.
translation.zh:
‎失望都不足以表达
‎我和你们父亲此刻的感受

translation.en: -We trusted you girls-- -The Volt is so small.
translation.zh:
‎-我们相信你们俩…
‎-那辆沃蓝达太小了

translation.en: Oh, you do not interrupt me when I'm talking to you--!
translation.zh: ‎在我跟你们说话的时候不许插嘴！

translation.en: You do not interrupt your mother.
translation.zh: ‎对 你们不许打断你们母亲

translation.en: Took your father's truck without permission.
translation.zh:
‎你们未经你们父亲的允许
‎就开了他的卡车

translation.en: and what's more, you didn't even tell us about crashing it.
translation.zh:
‎更糟糕的是 你们都没告诉
‎我们车子被撞坏的事

translation.en: You were dishonest and you were irresponsible.
We've decided that you two will have to pay for the repairs.
translation.zh: ‎我们决定由你们来承担修车费

translation.en: That's right, you'll have to get jobs.
[man] And if you can't handle that,
then we will fix the truck with the money we spend
translation.zh:
‎我们可以把花在送你俩
‎去威灵汉姆读书的钱

translation.en: See if y'all can handle public school.
translation.zh: ‎看看你们能否适应公立学校

translation.en: [woman] Is that what y'all want? Public school?
translation.zh: ‎这是你们想要的吗？公立学校？

translation.en: Where the principal wears blue jeans,
one long bench and a chalkboard on wheels.
Young lady, don't you get smart with me.
translation.zh: ‎小姑娘 别跟我耍小聪明

translation.en: [woman] Well, what are you waiting for? Go.
[sighs] If we leave right now, we can still make our court.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们现在走 就赶得上球场预约

translation.en: -[rock music playing] -That's good good good good good good.
And I need a big house with a white picket fence
translation.zh: ‎我还需要一个有白色木栅栏的大房子

translation.en: and Tawny Kitaen in the back, cooking me up some pancakes.
translation.zh: ‎然后托尼基坦在后厨给我做煎饼呢

‎-这是我需要的
‎-我们是认真的

translation.en: Well, I gave you a chance
and you didn't catch the skip,
so it doesn't sound promising to me.
translation.zh: ‎所以我觉得这主意不怎么好

translation.en: We have a lot of power in the community.
You know, solicitation of a prostitute and battery,
that just doesn't sound like John Stevens. Are you sure that the charges are right?
translation.zh:
‎这听起来不像是约翰史蒂文斯的风格
‎你确定那些指控没搞错吧？

translation.en: I would hate to put him away if he didn't really do it.
translation.zh:
‎因为如果不是他做的
‎那我肯定不想把他抓进监狱

translation.en: A bounty hunter catches a guy and collects the bounty.
translation.zh:
‎赏金猎人的工作就是抓人
‎然后领取赏金

translation.en: Whether he or she did it is no concern of mine.
translation.zh:
‎不管是不是他 或者她做的
‎都不关我的事

translation.en: And if you're real bounty hunters,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们是真正的赏金猎人

translation.en: it shouldn't be any of yours, either.
-He knows we're not bounty hunters. -Maybe he doesn't,
translation.zh:
‎-他知道我们不是赏金猎人
‎-或许他不知道

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, I can do that.
[sniffs] I know you're not really bounty hunters.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你们不是真赏金猎人
‎我是说：“你刚刚说什么 老哥？”
‎我查了你们的车牌号 孩子

translation.en: You're the teenage daughters of Anderson and Deborah Wesley
translation.zh:
‎你们安德森韦斯利
‎和黛博拉韦斯利的女儿

translation.en: Before that you were at 716 Margaret Mitchell.
translation.zh:
‎之前你们家住在
‎玛格丽特米歇尔大街716号

translation.en: By the way, your mama has six unpaid parking tickets.
translation.zh: ‎对了 你们妈妈有六张停车罚单没付

translation.en: You post on TikTok 4.2 times a week.
-Should I go on? -TikTok is an art.
translation.zh:
‎-还要我继续吗？
‎-抖音是一门艺术

translation.en: How do you know all of that?
Because I'm good at my job,
which is why I was going to let you get away with this
translation.zh: ‎所以我本来打算放你们一马

translation.en: until you deliver me John Stevens.
translation.zh: ‎除非你们把约翰史蒂文斯抓来

translation.en: but obviously that's beyond your scope.
translation.zh: ‎但显然这超出了你俩的能力

translation.en: But you said yourself we're good at this stuff.
Okay, but it just doesn't make sense for me, girls.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 但我想不通啊 姑娘们

translation.en: It'd be like I was babysitting.
[chuckles] And who wants to see me with a baby?
translation.zh: ‎谁会想看到我抱着个婴儿呢？

translation.en: Do you understand? Hell, come on.
Feel free to come by here any time to say hi.
Don't arrest John Stevens. We have inside information.
translation.zh:
‎请别逮捕约翰史蒂文斯
‎我们有内部信息

translation.en: Security footage from the night of the arrest.
[Sterling] Oh, my gosh, it's totally him.
Mr. Stevens did it, that little lying piece of shit.
translation.zh: ‎就是史蒂文斯先生干的 那个骗子

translation.en: -He beat up that poor woman. -We should have known.
translation.zh:
‎-他打了那个可怜的女人
‎-我们早该想到的

translation.en: He just happened to be at the bar? Motels don't have bars.
translation.zh:
‎他恰好就在酒吧？
‎汽车旅馆根本没有酒吧

translation.en: God, you're so smart. It's kind of annoying.
translation.zh: ‎老天 你真聪明 这有点烦人

translation.en: Okay, we need to find him.
Hey, text Miles and see if he's at The Men's Parlour.
translation.zh:
‎给迈尔斯发短信
‎看他是否在男子休息室

translation.en: He said he can't tell me.
-Tell him you'll go on a date with him. -[groans]
There's no way he's hiding out at home.
How the hell are we gonna find out where he went?
You might have an idea or actually have an idea.
translation.zh:
‎等等 你是或许有主意
‎还是真有主意

translation.en: No, I have an idea. Let me have my cool, ominous moment.
translation.zh:
‎不 我有主意
‎让我在这不详的时刻耍下酷

translation.en: Hey, April, we need to talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 阿普丽尔 我们得跟你聊聊

translation.en: The pressures of Fellowship too much already?
translation.zh: ‎团契已经压得你喘不过来气了吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, we met with your daddy this week,
translation.zh: ‎不 我们这周跟你爸爸见过面

translation.en: and he so graciously offered to sponsor our field trip to the soup kitchen.
translation.zh:
‎他慷慨地承诺要赞助
‎我们去施食处的实地考察

translation.en: Yeah, the problem is that funding is due tomorrow
translation.zh: ‎是啊 问题是钱款明天就得到账

translation.en: and we can't seem to find him. Do you know where he is?
translation.zh:
‎但我们找不到他
‎你知道他在哪吗？

translation.en: You met with him earlier this week?

translation.zh: ‎对 周一的时候 他办公室不错

translation.en: That's funny, because he took his helicopter to Hilton Head
translation.zh: ‎真奇怪 因为他10天前就搭直升机

translation.en: for a golf retreat ten days ago.
translation.zh: ‎去希尔顿海德的高尔夫度假会所了

translation.en: Oh. Sorry, did I say this past Monday? I meant the Monday before that. I'm-- [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我刚说这周一吗？
‎我其实是说上周一

translation.en: ...and yeah, my brain's like melted into a puddle, and, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎…没错 我的大脑都熔化成布丁了 对

translation.en: I don't know what you little tramps think you're up to,
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你们这两个小荡妇
‎在打什么鬼主意

translation.en: You do not want to mess with me, honey.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你还是别惹我比较好

translation.en: Just need the money to continue to spread Christ's love.
translation.zh: ‎我就需要那笔钱继续传播基督的爱嘛

translation.en: -No need to get worked up about it. -Stay away from my family.
translation.zh:
‎-你没必要这么激动
‎-离我的家人远点

translation.en: Read the room, Hannah B. For the love of God, read the room.
translation.zh:
‎你长点眼色吧 汉娜B
‎老天 你可长点眼色吧

translation.en: I wonder what Ellen would say if she knew
translation.zh: ‎也不知道艾伦会说什么 如果她知道

translation.en: that while I was home making care packages for homeless teens,
translation.zh:
‎我在家给无家可归的青少年
‎做爱心包裹时

translation.en: her star Fellowship leader was spreading her legs for Luke Creswell
translation.zh:
‎她的明星团契领袖正在高年级停车场
‎对卢克克莱斯维尔

translation.en: What would the whole school... say?
It was fun while it lasted, Sterl, huh?
translation.zh: ‎斯特尔 过程还是挺好玩的

translation.en: Just would have been nice if it ended
after we got the money to pay back Mom and Dad.
translation.zh: ‎还给爸妈的钱后再结束就好了

translation.en: Maybe we can get jobs at that other Yogurtopia on Peachtree.
translation.zh:
‎或许我们可以去桃树路上
‎那家酸奶乌托邦找工作

translation.en: Might not suck so hard if we get the same shift.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们上同一个班
‎或许就没多糟了

translation.en: "Hashtag April helps sick kids through Christ."
translation.zh:
‎“标签：阿普丽尔通过基督帮助
‎生病儿童”

translation.en: That's the hashtag of April's discipleship weekend.
translation.zh: ‎这是阿普丽尔上周末的门徒训练标签

translation.en: Where she took that stupid helicopter to her lake house.
translation.zh:
‎就是她坐那架破直升机
‎去湖畔别墅那次

translation.en: I bet he is hiding out there.
But how do we find the address?
Well, if April geo-tagged the photos, then--
translation.zh:
‎如果阿普丽尔在照片上
‎标注了定位 那…

translation.en: And her dad's account is private.
Take one of me like this.
Ster-- Sterling! What are you doing?

translation.zh: ‎虚假账号 性感的个人资料照片

translation.en: Top five... hottest guys at Willingham.
translation.zh: ‎威灵汉姆学院最帅的五个男生

‎-欧文卡如瑟
‎-对 切斯霍尔登

translation.en: Chase is, like, boring and hot.
and he looks like he'd be a really good cuddler.
Owen looks like he's going to die of some old-timey disease.
translation.zh:
‎欧文看起来像会因为
‎某种旧时候的疾病死掉一样

translation.en: Okay, we have the address. Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎好的 知道地址了 我们走！

translation.en: What about April ruining your Christian reputation?
translation.zh:
‎要是阿普丽尔
‎毁掉你的基督徒名声呢？

translation.en: Letting John Stevens walk around free of judgment?
translation.zh:
‎让约翰史蒂文斯像没事儿人
‎一样晃来晃去？

translation.en: That just wouldn't be the Christian thing to do.
Adventure kind of makes me horny.
[chuckling] What are you ladies doing here?
You know, you're lucky I didn't use my gun.
translation.zh: ‎你们太走运了 我没用枪

translation.en: -I'll have you arrested. What the hell? -[gun cocks]
translation.zh: ‎我要找人逮捕你们 怎么回事？

translation.en: Actually, Mr. Stevens, it's kind of the opposite.
translation.zh: ‎其实 史蒂文斯先生 恰恰相反

translation.en: Remember when you thought it would be cool
to cheat on your wife with a prostitute and then beat her up?
translation.zh:
‎如果你跟一个妓女偷情
‎然后狠狠殴打她吗？

‎-对 不怎么酷
‎-你们这俩小娘们儿

translation.en: Mr. Stevens, you crossed a line. That's nasty.
translation.zh:
‎史蒂文斯先生 你过分了
‎那个词太恶心了

translation.en: How dare you? Get out of my way!
[Blair] Yeah. Gave him the old "Wesley check".
translation.zh: ‎对 让他尝尝经典的“韦斯利阻挡”

translation.en: By the way, my name is Blair, bitch.
translation.zh: ‎对了 我叫布莱尔 贱人

translation.en: Could you shut the fuck up?
...and we asked about the help wanted poster.
And he, like, hired us on the spot.
Another great thing is the hours are flexible
translation.zh:
‎另一件超级棒的事
‎就是工作时间很有弹性

translation.en: So, instead of going to parties, you can go to work.
translation.zh:
‎所以你们不会去参加派对
‎而是去工作

translation.en: So tell me, what's the pay?
A hundred fifty dollars an hour?
Hi, Mr. Bowser! Meet our parents.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 鲍泽先生！这是我们的父母

translation.en: Oh, hey, you know, hey. The kids...
translation.zh: ‎嘿 其实 嘿 这俩孩子…

translation.en: [chuckling] All right. Well, we will see y'all at home.
Blair, honey, don't you think maybe you should tie your hair back?
translation.zh:
‎布莱尔 亲爱的 你不觉得
‎你应该把头发绑起来吗？

translation.en: You know, being around all this food.
Okay. Oh, nice to meet you.
No, her hand's... Her hand's here.
translation.zh: ‎不对 她的手…她的手在这里

translation.en: What's happening? Did y'all pay for that?
You can just take it out of our fifty percent.
translation.zh: ‎你可以从我们50%的分红里扣掉

translation.en: Okay, girls, you need to understand that there's a seniority in this business,
translation.zh:
‎好了 姑娘们 你们得知道
‎干这行讲究先来后到

translation.en: and I've been doing it much longer than you have,
so that has earned me a certain level of status, see?
translation.zh:
‎所以已经有了一定的地位
‎你们懂吧？

translation.en: and the name of my guy who'll fix your truck up for you cheap.
translation.zh:
‎以及我经常找的修车人的名字
‎他会低价修好你们的卡车

translation.en: Well, what if we don't accept that?
Oh, this is you playing hardball?
and can't secure a license to bounty hunt,
translation.zh: ‎而且申请不到赏金猎人的工作证

translation.en: if you want to keep working with me,
I don't think you have any options but to accept my terms.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得你们没有别的选择
‎只能答应我的条件

translation.en: So, you want to keep working with us?
I suppose I could, uh, see your potential
translation.zh: ‎我猜我看到了你们帮我在这里

translation.en: to broaden my access around these parts.
Oh, Jesus. [woman] Yelp says you don't close until eleven.
translation.zh:
‎-老天
‎-点评网上说你们11点才打烊

‎-你们的语音留言也这么说的
‎-可恶

translation.en: And put that hair in a bun or somethin'. Fix it up.
translation.zh:
‎把你的头发扎成丸子头或什么的
‎整理一下
